'' MAIN APP VIEW '' The Purramid Enable Overlay Overlay permission denied Clock Randomizers Screen Shade Spotlight Timers Traffic Light About this App
'' UNIVERSAL TERMS '' Pause Button A Pause button to temporarily stop time. Start A Start button to begin time Reset Button A Reset button to return time to its default Settings A Settings button to open a customization window On Off Color White Make your clock background white Black Make your clock background black Goldenrod Make your clock background goldenrod Teal Make your clock background teal Light Blue Make your clock background light blue Violet Make your clock background violet Close Cancel Delete
'' CLOCK APP '' Clock Settings Enable Floating Clock Clock Type Analog Digital AM PM 24-Hour Clock Set Time Zone Unable to load model: %1$s Unable to load texture: %1$s Unable to create texture: %1$s Display Seconds Set Alarm Nest Clock Add another Clock
'' RANDOMIZERS APP '' Spin Choose a List Open a drop-down menu to select a list Randomizer Type List Editor Spin Animation Announce Result Celebrate Result Sequence Results Add New List Delete List Delete List? Are you sure you want to delete '%1$s'? This cannot be undone. Previous sequence item Next sequence item
'' SCREEN SHADE APP ''
'' SPOTLIGHT APP '' Add another Spotlight Change spotlight shape
'' TIMERS APP '' Timer Type Set Time Hundredths Play music Lap times No laps recorded Stopwatch sounds
'' TRAFFIC LIGHT APP '' Mode Manual Change Responsive Change (Requires Microphone) Timed Change Horizontal Orientation Enable Blinking Effects Adjust Responsive Values Add/Edit Messages Edit Timed Sequence Show Time Remaining (Timed Mode) Show Timeline (Timed Mode) Add Another Traffic Light Close
'' ABOUT THIS APP '' Version 0.1 '' in dev ''

Data Privacy (USA & EU) At Purramid Learning, Inc., we are committed to your privacy. This application, The Purramid, does not collect, share, or transmit any personal data away from the device on which it is installed. All data generated and used within the application remains solely on your device.
Best Practices for Responsible Use While The Purramid application is designed to operate locally and does not collect or transmit personal data, we encourage users to adopt responsible practices when using the application, especially in educational or collaborative settings. We recommend the following: 

* Avoid Storing Identifiable Information: To further safeguard privacy, we advise against directly storing personally identifiable information (PII) such as full names, specific addresses, or other sensitive details within the application's content or file names. Consider using anonymized labels or codes if necessary for your workflow. 
* Mindful Sharing (If Applicable): If you choose to share files or content created with The Purramid application, be mindful of the information contained within them and ensure they do not inadvertently include sensitive personal data. 
* Secure Your Device: As all application data is stored locally on your device, ensure your device itself is secured with appropriate measures such as strong passwords or biometric authentication to prevent unauthorized access. 
* Regular Backups: While not related to privacy, regularly backing up your application data is a good practice to prevent data loss.
Acknowledgements The development of The Purramid application involved the use of advanced artificial intelligence models, including Gemini, for code generation and assistance. We leveraged these tools to enhance the efficiency of our development process. 

We also want to explicitly acknowledge that all visual art and assets included within The Purramid application were created by human artists who were fairly compensated for their work. We believe in supporting the creative community and ensuring ethical practices in the creation of our application's design.

By installing, copying, or otherwise using the Application, the User agrees to be bound by the terms of this EULA. If the User does not agree to the terms of this EULA, do not install or use the Application.

2. Ownership: The Application is owned by the Licensor and is protected by copyright laws and international treaty provisions. The Licensor retains all rights, title, and interest in and to the Application.

4. THE ENTIRE RISK AS TO THE QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE OF THE APPLICATION IS WITH THE USER. SHOULD THE APPLICATION PROVE DEFECTIVE, THE USER ASSUMES THE ENTIRE COST OF ANY SERVICING, REPAIR, OR CORRECTION. 

5. Limitation of Liability: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, IN NO EVENT SHALL THE LICENSOR BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES (INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES) ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THE USER'S ACCESS TO, USE OF, OR INABILITY TO ACCESS OR USE THE APPLICATION, EVEN IF THE LICENSOR HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. 

6. Termination: This EULA is effective until terminated. The User may terminate this EULA by uninstalling the Application. This EULA will terminate automatically without notice from the Licensor if the User fails to comply with any provision of this EULA. Upon termination, the User must cease all use of the Application and destroy all copies thereof. 

7. Governing Law: This EULA shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New Hampshire, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
